name: Minions of Elden
description:
Minions of Elden is an in development 2D MMORPG based in player freedom. There are no classes here, there is no required story line. Kill 50000 crabs if thats how you want to play. Engage in PvP battles with your friends, or bring your friends to fight other players over rare loot spawns. Play how you want.


JOIN THE DISCORD!: https://discord.gg/EXhc6yh



Thanks to patchkit.net for the great launcher service. Check them out if you need a launcher/patcher service thats not only easy to use, but affordable as well!
